Generated Narrative: CodeSystem pco-concepts

This case-sensitive code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pco/CodeSystem/pco-concepts defines the following codes in a Is-A hierarchy:

CodeDisplayDefinition
person-centered Person-CenteredGeneral category for person-centered goals and observations
what-matters What MattersKnow and align care with each person's specific health outcome goals and care preferences including, but not limited to, end-of-life care, and across settings of care.

name: PCOConcepts
title: Person-Centered Outcome Concepts
description: Code system to identify resource codes and category codes for Person-Centered Outcomes.

concept.definition: General category for person-centered goals and observations
Know and align care with each person's specific health outcome goals and care preferences including, but not limited to, end-of-life care, and across settings of care.
